scripts.set-dev: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const config = fs.readFileSync('src/config.ts', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('src/config.ts', config.replace(/const FORCE_ENVIRONMENT.*= '(development|production)';/, 'const FORCE_ENVIRONMENT: \'development\' | \'production\' | null = \'development\';'));"
scripts.set-prod: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const config = fs.readFileSync('src/config.ts', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('src/config.ts', config.replace(/const FORCE_ENVIRONMENT.*= '(development|production)';/, 'const FORCE_ENVIRONMENT: \'development\' | \'production\' | null = \'production\';'));"
